00059 TreeSceneCtrl::TreeSceneCtrl(wxWindow *parent, const wxWindowID id, const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, long style,
00060                                    const wxValidator &validator, const wxString &name) : wxTreeCtrl(parent, id, pos, size, style, validator, name)
00061 {
00062         m_currentTreeID = 0;

00074 void TreeSceneCtrl::OnItemMenu(wxTreeEvent& event)
00075 {
00076         m_currentTreeID = event.GetItem();
00077 
00078         m_treeItemData = (TreeSceneItemData *)GetItemData(m_currentTreeID);
00079 
00080         if (m_treeItemData != NULL)
00081         {
00082                 // build menu for item-operation
00083                 wxPoint clientpt = event.GetPoint();
00084                 buildMenu(clientpt);
00085         }
00086         else if (m_currentTreeID.IsOk() && GetItemText(m_currentTreeID) == wxT("Papierkorb"))
00087         {
00088                 // build menu to empty trash
00089                 wxMenu menu;
00090                 menu.Append(idMenuEmptyTrash, wxT("Papierkorb leeren"));
00091                 PopupMenu(&menu, event.GetPoint());
00092         }
00093 }
00094 
00099 void TreeSceneCtrl::OnItemActivated(wxTreeEvent& event)
00100 {
00101         m_currentTreeID = event.GetItem();
00102 
00103         m_treeItemData = (TreeSceneItemData *)GetItemData(m_currentTreeID);
00104 
00105         if (m_treeItemData != NULL && m_treeItemData->getAssembly()->getType() != IS_GROUP)
00106         {
00107                 createAssemblyDataFrame();
00108         }
00109 }
00110 
00115 void TreeSceneCtrl::buildMenu(const wxPoint& pt)
00116 {
00117         // create dropdown-menu
00118         wxMenu menu;
00119 
00120         if (m_treeItemData->getAssembly()->getMaster()->getType() == IS_TRASH)
00121         {
00122                 menu.Append(idMenuUndelete, wxT("&Wiederherstellen"));
00123         }
00124         else if (m_treeItemData->getAssembly()->getMaster()->getParent() == NULL ||
00125                  m_treeItemData->getAssembly()->getMaster()->getParent()->getType() == IS_ROOT ||
00126                  m_treeItemData->getAssembly()->getMaster()->getParent()->getType() == IS_SELECTED)
00127         {
00128                 // no trash; add other options
00129 
00130                 // group or item?
00131                 if (m_treeItemData->getAssembly()->getType() != IS_GROUP)
00132                 {
00133                         menu.Append(idMenuEdit, wxT("&Bearbeiten"));
00134                 }
00135                 else
00136                 {
00137                         menu.Append(idMenuRename, wxT("&Umbennenen"));
00138                 }
00139 
00140                 menu.AppendSeparator();
00141 
00142                 // selected?
00143                 if (m_treeItemData->getAssembly()->getMaster()->getType() == IS_SELECTED)
00144                 {
00145                         menu.Append(idMenuDeselect, wxT("&Deselektieren"));
00146                 }
00147                 else
00148                 {
00149                         menu.Append(idMenuSelect, wxT("&Selektieren"));
00150                 }
00151 
00152                 // visible?
00153                 if (m_treeItemData->getAssembly()->isVisible())
00154                 {
00155                         menu.Append(idMenuHide, wxT("&Verbergen"));
00156                 }
00157                 else
00158                 {
00159                         menu.Append(idMenuVisible, wxT("&Anzeigen"));
00160                 }
00161 
00162                 menu.Append(idMenuDelete, wxT("&Löschen"));
00163         }
00164 
00165         PopupMenu(&menu, pt);
00166 }

00168 void TreeSceneCtrl::OnEdit(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00169 {
00170         createAssemblyDataFrame();
00171 }
00172 
00173 void TreeSceneCtrl::createAssemblyDataFrame()
00174 {
00175         m_assemblyDataFrame = new AssemblyDataFrame;
00176         m_assemblyDataFrame->Show();
00177         m_assemblyDataFrame->fillFields(m_treeItemData->getAssembly());
00178 }
00179 
00180 void TreeSceneCtrl::OnRename(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00181 {
00182         renameItem();
00183 }
00184 
00189 void TreeSceneCtrl::OnKeyDown(wxKeyEvent& event)
00190 {
00191         if (event.GetKeyCode() == WXK_F2)
00192         {
00193                 m_currentTreeID = GetSelection();
00194 
00195                 m_treeItemData = (TreeSceneItemData *)GetItemData(m_currentTreeID);
00196 
00197                 if (m_treeItemData != NULL)
00198                 {
00199                         renameItem();
00200                 }
00201         }
00202 }
00203 
00204 void TreeSceneCtrl::renameItem()
00205 {
00206         // create dialog and ask for name
00207         wxTextEntryDialog ted(this, wxT("Neuer Name"));
00208         if (ted.ShowModal() == wxID_CANCEL)
00209         {
00210                 // if pressed cancel, do nothing
00211                 return;
00212         }
00213         m_treeItemData->getAssembly()->setName(ted.GetValue());
00214 
00215         // send event to refresh Scene-Tree
00216         NotifyEvent gnrevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00217         gnrevent.setGNREventType(REFRESHSCENETREE);
00218         ProcessEvent(gnrevent);
00219 }
00220 
00221 void TreeSceneCtrl::OnVisible(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00222 {
00223         // send event to handle setVisible
00224         TreeControlEvent treeEvent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_TREE_CONTROL);
00225         treeEvent.setEventType(SCENEVISIBLE);
00226         treeEvent.setAssembly(m_treeItemData->getAssembly());
00227         ProcessEvent(treeEvent);
00228 }

00230 void TreeSceneCtrl::OnHide(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00231 {
00232         // send event to handle setHide
00233         TreeControlEvent treeEvent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_TREE_CONTROL);
00234         treeEvent.setEventType(SCENEHIDE);
00235         treeEvent.setAssembly(m_treeItemData->getAssembly());
00236         ProcessEvent(treeEvent);
00237 }
00238 
00239 void TreeSceneCtrl::OnSelect(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00240 {
00241         // send event to handle select
00242         TreeControlEvent treeEvent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_TREE_CONTROL);
00243         treeEvent.setEventType(SCENESELECT);
00244         if (m_treeItemData->getMaster()->isType(IS_GROUP))
00245         {
00246                 treeEvent.setAssembly(m_treeItemData->getMaster());
00247         }
00248         else
00249         {
00250                 treeEvent.setAssembly(m_treeItemData->getAssembly());
00251         }
00252         ProcessEvent(treeEvent);
00253 }
00254

00256 {
00257         // send event to handle deselect
00258         TreeControlEvent treeEvent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_TREE_CONTROL);
00259         treeEvent.setEventType(SCENEDESELECT);
00260         treeEvent.setAssembly(m_treeItemData->getAssembly());
00261         ProcessEvent(treeEvent);
00262 }

00264 void TreeSceneCtrl::OnDelete(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00265 {
00266         // send event to handle delete
00267         TreeControlEvent treeEvent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_TREE_CONTROL);
00268         treeEvent.setEventType(SCENEDELETE);
00269         treeEvent.setAssembly(m_treeItemData->getAssembly());

00273 void TreeSceneCtrl::OnUndelete(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00274 {
00275         // send event to handle undelete
00276         TreeControlEvent treeEvent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_TREE_CONTROL);

00282 void TreeSceneCtrl::OnEmptyTrash(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00283 {
00284         // send event to handle emptytrash
00285         NotifyEvent notifyEvent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00286         notifyEvent.setGNREventType(EMPTYTRASH);
00287         ProcessEvent(notifyEvent);
00288 }
